data.title: Shows A-Z - ghost whisperer on cbs

[10/17/14 - 11:39 PM]

Development Update: Friday, October 17

Updates include: FOX to revive "The Courtship of Eddie's Father"; NBC eyes "Marley & Me" adaptation; and AMC's annual "bake off" features seven potential drama projects.

New additions include "Undercover Boss," "United States of Tara," "Everybody Loves Raymond" and "Ghost Whisperer."

Syfy's "Haven" Welcomes Danny Masterson and Kris Lemche as Guest Stars Friday, November 22 at 10PM

Development Update: Tuesday, October 23

[05/18/11 - 09:25 AM]

Syfy Acquires Supernatural Drama Series "Lost Girl" from Prodigy Pictures
